idea:
Company provides services in oil and gas industry.

We provide various inspection services to oil and gas industries like UAV surveys, inspection by crawler, ROV etc. We also offer economical and efficient solution for their asset integrity problems. Our technology of using UAV, ROV and 3D laser scanning can detect problems in installed assets very fast and at minimal personal risk that too with greater accuracy. We also provide solutions such as marine growth removal and prevention, flare tip inspection, cold pad repairs, composite wrap solutions, customised well intervention services etc.
